function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Violation of ecosystem due to large human population gathering and intervention","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Human-to-human transmission of sars-cov-2 leading to the spread of covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential fog-cloud combined iot network for covid-19 prevention and control","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Deployment of ai to diagnose covid-19 symptoms and pneumonia","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of mobile remote presence systems for medical consultations","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of infectious disease transmission to frontline healthcare workers","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The use of iot, drones, robots, and wearable devices can lead to privacy and data security risks, as personal health information may be compromised.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on cloud computing and big data analytics for outbreak prediction and tracking may lead to data breaches and unauthorized access to sensitive information.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Deployment of ai and ml for disease prediction and diagnosis may lead to biases in decision-making and inaccurate assessments, impacting treatment and resource allocation.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Deployment of digital technologies may lead to privacy and data security risks in handling personal health information.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on digital platforms may lead to issues of digital divide, limiting access to healthcare assistance for certain populations.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Interoperability challenges may arise when integrating multiple digital technologies used for covid-19 mitigation, leading to data silos and reduced efficiency.","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Reduced effectiveness of contact tracing due to low smartphone penetration, especially among the elderly.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Privacy concerns related to the collection and storage of personal information by mobile apps.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on people’s willingness to embrace new technology and digital infrastructure for successful implementation of digital communication tracing and tracking.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential data breaches due to inadequate encryption and access control systems","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Non-compliance with data regulation laws such as hipaa and gdpr","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of strategy to handle downtime in cloud computing","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential spread of covid-19 infection through medical iot devices","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Latency in real-time diagnosis and data processing","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Security risk of cloud computing in healthcare data storage","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of trust in government relief funds for covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Underutilization of blockchain and dlt for relief fund distribution","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of exploration of cloud computing for covid-19 response","category":"Structure","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Failure to protect privacy and confidentiality when using big data for disease modeling and monitoring human behavior","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Issues with blockchain technology adoption for protecting health information and monitoring outbreak data","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of research on the impact of vr and ar technologies on disease propagation in educational settings.","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of guidelines for safe implementation of vr and ar technologies in public places for security and patrol purposes.","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Robots and drones reducing interpersonal contact leading to potential loss of human connection and empathy.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependency on ai/ml/dl for critical healthcare decisions leading to potential errors or biases.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on 5g for remote healthcare services leading to potential data security and privacy risks.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependency on iot devices for covid-19 management","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Data privacy and security risks with iot devices","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of thermal imaging for temperature screening","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of social distancing in affected areas","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of robots and drones for quarantine assistance and containment of covid-19","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Usage of drones for delivery and transportation during the pandemic","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Robotic-assisted surgery ras during the pandemic","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global increase in medical device sales","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of iot devices for tracking and surveillance may raise privacy concerns for individuals being monitored.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on iot devices for early diagnosis may lead to inaccurate results and mismanagement of covid-19 cases.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of standardization and regulation in the use of iot devices for pandemic management may result in inconsistent data collection and analysis.","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Focus on covid-19 and digital technologies may overlook other contagious diseases that pose a risk to public health.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exploration of untested technologies for pandemic control","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Failure to address immediate problems during covid-19 crisis","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of focus on safe living environments post-covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increasing reliance on digital technology for essential services","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Legal and ethical constraints of deploying emerging technology for disease surveillance and control","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risks of accuracy, safety, protection, and data quality in disease surveillance and control technologies","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global pandemic infectious disease","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"}]}
